overview_of_class: First course of sequence designed to develop writing skills and structures through examination of the relationship between the individual and society. Emphasis on short texts and essays.
name: Individual and Society through Written Expression
title: WCAS SPANISH 203-0-20 Individual and Society through Written Expression

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: First course of sequence designed to develop writing skills and structures through examination of the relationship between the individual and society. Emphasis on short texts and essays.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: 201, AP score of 5 on the Spanish Language or Literature Exam, or departmental placement exam

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: SPANISH
